step.sql: SELECT P.* FROM LOG_OPERATION P WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM LOG_DETAIL L WHERE P.OP_ID=L.OP_ID AND L.MESH_ID [mesh] AND L.COM_STA=0);
SELECT P.* FROM LOG_DETAIL P WHERE P.MESH_ID [mesh] AND P.COM_STA=0;
DELETE FROM LOG_OPERATION P WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM LOG_DETAIL L WHERE P.OP_ID=L.OP_ID AND L.MESH_ID [mesh] AND L.COM_STA=0);
DELETE FROM LOG_DETAIL P WHERE P.MESH_ID [mesh] AND P.COM_STA=0;
